title: AI Product Recommendation Engine
oneLiner: Built an intelligent recommendation system that increased user engagement by 45% through personalized product suggestions.

sections.problem: Users were overwhelmed by product choices and struggled to find relevant items. The existing search and filter system had low engagement rates and high bounce rates on product listing pages.
insight: Users prefer personalized discovery over active search
Real-time feedback loops improve recommendation quality
sections.solution: Designed and built a hybrid recommendation engine combining collaborative filtering with content-based approaches. Created an intuitive UI that surfaces recommendations at key decision points without overwhelming users.
learnings: Balancing exploration vs exploitation in ML models
Designing transparent AI interfaces that build trust
Iterative deployment strategies for ML products

title: Enterprise Design System
oneLiner: Led the creation of a comprehensive design system that reduced design-to-dev handoff time by 60%.

sections.problem: The product suite suffered from inconsistent UI patterns, leading to confusion for users and inefficiency for the design and engineering teams. Each new feature required reinventing common components.
insight: Consistency builds user trust and reduces cognitive load
Design systems must be flexible yet opinionated
Documentation is as important as the components themselves
sections.solution: Developed a scalable design system with 50+ components, comprehensive documentation, and clear contribution guidelines. Established a governance model to ensure long-term maintenance.

title: User Research Platform
oneLiner: Built a platform that streamlined user research operations and improved insight accessibility across the organization.

sections.problem: User research was siloed and inaccessible. Teams struggled to find existing insights, leading to redundant studies and missed opportunities for evidence-based decision making.
insight: Structured data enables powerful search and discovery
sections.solution: Created a centralized research repository with advanced search, tagging, and insight linking capabilities. Built workflows for research planning, execution, and knowledge sharing.

title: Mobile App Redesign
oneLiner: Redesigned the core mobile experience resulting in a 50% increase in daily active users.

sections.problem: The mobile app had poor user retention and low engagement. User feedback indicated confusion with navigation and frustration with core workflows.
insight: User testing early prevents costly mistakes
sections.solution: Conducted extensive user research to identify pain points. Redesigned information architecture and key user flows with a focus on simplicity and efficiency.

title: Analytics Dashboard
oneLiner: Created an intuitive analytics dashboard that made complex data accessible to non-technical stakeholders.

sections.problem: Business stakeholders struggled to access and interpret data. Reports were manually compiled, leading to delayed decisions and inconsistent metrics.
sections.solution: Designed and built a self-service analytics dashboard with customizable views, automated reporting, and intuitive data visualization.

title: Accessibility Initiative
oneLiner: Led a comprehensive accessibility audit and remediation that achieved WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

sections.problem: The product had significant accessibility barriers affecting users with disabilities. Legal compliance was at risk and user experience was suboptimal for many.
insight: Early integration is cheaper than retrofits
Automated testing catches only 30% of issues
sections.solution: Conducted comprehensive accessibility audit using automated tools and manual testing. Prioritized and remediated issues, established ongoing monitoring and training.
